title: The “300” Workout for Abs (OFFICIAL!)
description: Get ripped abs and build athletic muscle in 90 days http://athleanx.com/x/build-muscle-get-shredded-here This workout for abs is ...
transcript:
What's up, guys? Jeff Cavaliere, ATHLEANX.com. We're going old school today. A "300" style ab workout. It doesn't matter what level of ability you're
at. I've got a beginner, and an advanced version,
and guess what? The advanced version, we're breaking out the
barbell. That's right, I'm going to show you how to
use a barbell today to train your abs. So without further ado, let's get right to
this thing. This is one bad boy that you're going to want
to start incorporating into your ab training. So there you have it, guys. 300 reps. It doesn't matter what ability you are at. Remember the key is this: try to work to get
better. I don't care if you start with a beginner. One day you'll be doing the advanced and if
you're on the advanced there's nothing stopping you from throwing more weight on that bar. So, keep challenging yourself if you want
to change yourself. That's what we do here and more importantly,
we put the science back in strength. If you're looking for a complete program that
includes abs and core in everything we do – because that's how our body works – then
head to ATHLEANX.com right now and get our ATHLEANX training system. If you liked this video, make sure you leave
your comments and thumbs up below. Let me know what else you want to see here
on this channel and I'll always do my best to bring that to you. All right, guys. I'll be back here again real soon. See you.
